ABOUT ME

I am a software developer apprentice in the Columbus, Ohio area. I love math, and math loves me! I'm always interested in learning and sharing information to do cool things. I love my family, am passionate about lifelong learning, and am addicted to aeronautics, aerospace engineering, and alternate forms of propulsion.

PROJECTS

My Github.io Page

Link to project on GitHub

This project is a work in process. In its current state, it's an example of some rudimentary responsive design in which both (CSS) Flexbox and Grid are used to style an HTML page.

Hospital Project

Link to project on GitHub

This project is a command-line application that simulates a rudimentary hospital payroll, initiates medical employee-patient interactions, and allows user to see the status of all employees.

Virtual Pet

Link to project on GitHub

This project is a command-line application that simulates a shelter for virtual pets (similar to tamagotchi). User can add new pets to the shelter, interact with them in multiple ways, and send them away.
